What page to load after the payment provider! This is normally the default thank-you-page '/shop/confirmation_static' or a page where the default FS-Online thank-you-page is embedded as an iframe. You may set this at multiple levels: 'Globally > by Payment Provider > by Category > by Product' where the later overrules the former.

Products with identical configurations (Theme, Checkout Fields, redirect_url, ...) will stay in the cart together by default. If you wish to remove all other products from the cart when this product is added to the cart (regardless of the configuration) you can tick this checkbox. This should be set for all products if you do not show the cart in your checkout process!
